description: An Italian inspired tomato based vegetarian dish packed with herbs.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Traditional Sicilian Eggplant Caponata Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and chopped
1 stalk celery, leaves removed and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Dice the eggplant, drizzle with 1 tbs of oil and roast in the oven on a roasting tray for 30 minutes tossing halfway through.

Heat up a large saucepan to a medium heat with 1 tbs of oil and fry the onions, celery and peppers for 6 minutes. Once the eggplant has roasted, remove from the oven and place on the pan with the other vegetables and fry for 2 minutes.
Add the rest of the ingredients apart from the parsley, mix well and allow the entire dish to simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from the heat, garnish with parsley and serve with a choice of side.
